steps.title: Play Nuxeo
steps.content: Let’s start by running the Nuxeo. We simplify your work by building a default Nuxeo bundle. This Automation operation has been automatically generated to let you code within and deploy it into Nuxeo.

steps.title: Nuxeo Execution
steps.content: Codenvy launches a Docker container for each Nuxeo run. Your Nuxeo bundle is copied into it. Click the URL here to see the application when Nuxeo is started.

steps.title: Edit the Nuxeo bundle
steps.content: Edit the project, add contributions, deploy your functionnalities. See following documentation http://doc.nuxeo.com to use Nuxeo API to deploy awesome features! Don't forget to save the file when you’re done.

steps.title: Warning: Temporary Workspace
steps.content: This project has been created in a temporary workspace which has 2GB of RAM. Your project will be destroyed if you close the tab or become idle.
